con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="Process" targetNamespace="http://www.tmw.com/PhoneValidation/wsdl/1603967929975" xmlns:ns="http://www.tmw.com/PhoneValidation/wsdl/1603967929975" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.tmw.com/Schemas/PhoneValidationRequest/1.0.0" xmlns:alp="http://www.tmw.com/Schemas/Common/PhoneValidationRequest/1.0.0"> <xsd:element name="PhoneValidationRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Header"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Domain" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Source" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Target" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="CompanyID"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="TMW"/> <xsd:enumeration value="KNG"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MSP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TMWSUP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="JAB"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MCY"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="GlobalTransactionID" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="BusinessID" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="ProjectName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Timestamp" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Priority" type="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Body"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="PhoneNumber" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PhoneValidationResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Header"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Domain" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Source" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Target" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="CompanyID"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="TMW"/> <xsd:enumeration value="KNG"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MSP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TMWSUP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="JAB"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MCY"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="GlobalTransactionID" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="BusinessID" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="ProjectName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Timestamp" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Priority" type="xsd:integer"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="Body"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="PhoneNumber" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="StatusMessage" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="validatePhoneRequest"> <wsdl:part element="ns0:PhoneValidationRequest" name="ValidationRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="validatePhoneResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ns0:PhoneValidationResponse" name="ValidationResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="Process"> <wsdl:operation name="validatePhone"> <wsdl:input message="ns:validatePhoneRequest" name="operationInput"/> <wsdl:output message="ns:validatePhoneResponse" name="operationOutput"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="SOAPServiceBinding" type="ns:Process"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="validatePhone"> <soap:operation soapAction="validatePhone" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body parts="ValidationRequest" use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body parts="ValidationResponse" use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="Process"> <wsdl:port binding="ns:SOAPServiceBinding" name="ProcessSOAP"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:7091/SOAPServiceBinding/process/"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

con:testCase.name: Add Employee

con:config.script:
def TestCase = context.testCase
PropertiesTestStep = TestCase.getTestStepByName("Properties") Stop = PropertiesTestStep.getPropertyValue("End").toString() if(Stop =="True") { log.info("Exit Groovy Script - Data Loop") PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("Total","") PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("TestRequest", "") PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("Counter", "0") PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("End", "False") } else testRunner.gotoStepByName("Groovy Script - Test Data")

con:testCase.name: Get Employee
